guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fa9vs","text":"The goal is to obtain a homogenous compound consisting of several constituent materials. The minimum total runtime required to obtain this homogeneous compound should be used which may require removing and observing the sample before placing it back into the arc melter for additional time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: arc-melting
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"2h86","text":"Do not look directly at the arc from the arc melter. The electromagnetic radiation can damage your eyes, similar to looking directly at the sun.
